name: Mommy Nature
description:
The forest sprite Cassie is the only thing standing between the Forest of Brigh, home to many magical creatures, and the savages who  seek to destroy it. 

This project was developed at a 48-hour game jam event "Save The Jam" organized by ITU Game Design and Development Club on December 09-11, 2022. #savethejam

// CONTROLS //

WASD for navigation

Spacebar to upgrade in the start area

// CREDITS //

Elif Topal - Game Design

Muzaffer Erkan Küpçük - Game Development
